subject: Hockey, Ice
Stadiums and Arenas
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: Judging from the response of fans and the growing eagerness among N.H.L. clubs to host the event, this year’s Winter Classic has already outdone its predecessors.
snippet: Judging from the response of fans and the growing eagerness among N.H.L. clubs to host the event, this year’s Winter Classic has already outdone its predecessors.
